title: The Losing Heroine Dumped by Her Shady Childhood Friend Will Definitely Win as Long as I’m Around! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   Confident Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cute Story   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   First Love   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Strong Love Interests
author: みずがめ
description:
Chinatsu Sugito is a tsundere girl.

She is scorned by her childhood friend whom she likes because of a misunderstanding. Masataka Sano, who happened to witness the scene, saw his chance and stood up to take advantage of it. Although Masataka has been in love with Chinatsu, she has known a boy since she was born. He had half given up on her, but suddenly an opportunity presented itself. Not wanting to let this opportunity pass, Masataka relentlessly took advantage of Chinatsu’s weak heart.

Chinatsu’s heart gradually unraveled. She can no longer live without him…. Even when Osako realizes that the nagging tsundere girl is his kind and beautiful childhood friend, it’s too late!>
